personal.bio: Hi! I'm **Samir Randeriya**, a passionate **Senior Lead Software Engineer** with over 4 years of experience building scalable web applications and robust backend systems. I specialize in **Laravel**, **PHP**, **Vue.js**, **React.js**, **Nuxt.js**, and modern web technologies, turning complex ideas into elegant, functional solutions. I have extensive experience with **RESTful APIs**, **database design**, and **cloud infrastructure**. My journey is driven by continuous learning, contributing to open-source projects, and staying current with emerging technologies to deliver exceptional digital experiences.
